metadata.title: CVE-2024-42067 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:bpf: Take return from set_memory_rox() into account withbpf_jit_binary_lock_ro()set_memory_rox() can fail, leaving memory unprotected.Check return and bail out when bpf_jit_binary_lock_ro() returnsan error.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
